column1: MRI image size (128, 256, 1) illustrating the head of a man of 37 years old in weighting T2, with sagittal section. We observe slice n°137 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The section reveals the brainstem of volume 756.7383 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 3825.8789 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 5721.6797 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 282.1289 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 429.7852 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1658.4961 mm³, the right thalamus proper of volume 468.0176 mm³, the right caudate nucleus of volume 187.2070 mm³, the right hippocampus of volume 7.9102 mm³, the right nucleus accumbens of volume 67.2363 mm³ and the right ventral diencephalon of volume 214.8926 mm³.
